birth_place.zh-cn: 山东省肥城市安驾庄镇夏辉村
birth_place.en: Xiahui Village, Anjiazhuang Town, Feicheng, Shandong Province

description.zh-cn: “明天系”的幕后控制人，商人，拥有加拿大、安提瓜和巴布达国籍及香港居留权。
description.en: The behind-the-scenes controller of the "Tomorrow Group", a businessman with Canadian, Antiguan and Barbudan citizenship, and Hong Kong residency.

description.zh-cn: 由肖建华幕后控制的庞大商业集团，涉足金融、科技等多个领域。
description.en: A large business conglomerate controlled by Xiao Jianhua, involved in various sectors including finance and technology.

description.zh-cn: 中国顶尖的综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A major Chinese research university.

description.zh-cn: 1989年发生在中国北京的抗议示威活动，最终被武力清场。
description.en: Pro-democracy protests that took place in Beijing, China in 1989, ending in a military crackdown.

nodes.id: 上海市第一中级人民法院

zh-cn: 上海市第一中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海市的司法机关。
description.en: A judicial body located in Shanghai, China.

description.zh-cn: 明天系的核心公司。
description.en: The core company of the Tomorrow Group.

description.zh-cn: 肖建华的妻子，明天控股的联合创始人。
description.en: Xiao Jianhua's wife and co-founder of Tomorrow Holding.

description.zh-cn: 肖建华的父亲，曾任初中老师。
description.en: Xiao Jianhua's father, who was a middle school teacher.

nodes.id: 北京北大明天资源科技有限公司

zh-cn: 北京北大明天资源科技有限公司

description.zh-cn: 中国企业家，阿里巴巴集团的创始人。
description.en: Chinese entrepreneur, founder of Alibaba Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国前国家副主席曾庆红之子。
description.en: Son of former Chinese Vice President Zeng Qinghong.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共中央政治局常委、中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, former member of the Politburo Standing Committee and Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

en: China Banking and Insurance Regulatory Commission

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院直属事业单位，负责统一监督管理银行业和保险业。
description.en: An agency of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, authorized to supervise the banking and insurance industries.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院直属事业单位，负责证券期货市场的监督管理。
description.en: An agency of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, authorized to regulate the securities and futures markets.

description.zh-cn: 中国企业家，百度公司的创始人、董事长兼首席执行官。
description.en: Chinese entrepreneur, co-founder, chairman, and CEO of Baidu.

description.zh-cn: 曾任国家开发银行副行长。
description.en: Former Vice Governor of China Development Bank.

description.zh-cn: 肖建华出生于山东省泰安地区肥城县（今肥城市）安驾庄镇夏辉村。
description.en: Xiao Jianhua was born in Xiahui Village, Anjiazhuang Town, Feicheng County (now Feicheng City), Tai'an Prefecture, Shandong Province.

description.zh-cn: 1986年，年仅14岁的肖建华作为泰安市高考状元进入北京大学法律系就读。
description.en: In 1986, at the age of 14, Xiao Jianhua entered the Law Department of Peking University as the top scorer of the college entrance examination in Tai'an City.

description.zh-cn: 在校期间曾担任北京大学学生会主席。
description.en: Served as Chairman of the Peking University Student Union during his time at the university.

description.zh-cn: 在校期间曾担任全国学联副主席。
description.en: Served as Vice Chairman of the All-China Students' Federation during his time at the university.

description.zh-cn: 肖建华是公司集团“明天系”的幕后控制人。
description.en: Xiao Jianhua is the behind-the-scenes controller of the "Tomorrow Group" corporate conglomerate.

relationships.target: 北京北大明天资源科技有限公司

relationships.source: 上海市第一中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 对被告人肖建华数罪并罚，决定执行有期徒刑13年，并处罚金人民币650万元。
description.en: Sentenced the defendant Xiao Jianhua to 13 years in prison for multiple crimes and imposed a fine of RMB 6.5 million.

description.zh-cn: 据《纽约时报》报道，肖建华在六四事件期间与校方合作试图平息抗议，毕业后在北京大学的资助下经商，其财富被认为与此段经历有关。
description.en: According to The New York Times, Xiao Jianhua cooperated with the university to quell protests during the 1989 Tiananmen Square incident. He started his business with funding from Peking University after graduation, and his wealth is believed to be related to this experience.

description.zh-cn: 据《纽约时报》报道，毕业之后，肖建华在北京大学的直接资助下步入了商界。
description.en: According to The New York Times, after graduation, Xiao Jianhua entered the business world with direct funding from Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 据《纽约时报》2024年7月报道，肖建华的明天控股集团曾在五年内获得了马云旗下多家公司的丰厚股份，二人背后有隐秘商业联系及至少10亿美元的投资。
description.en: According to a July 2024 report by The New York Times, Xiao Jianhua's Tomorrow Holding Group acquired substantial stakes in several of Jack Ma's companies over five years, with secret business ties and at least $1 billion in investments linking the two.

description.zh-cn: 《纽约时报》发文揭秘了肖建华和马云之间的隐秘商业联系。
description.en: The New York Times published an article revealing the secret business connections between Xiao Jianhua and Jack Ma.

description.zh-cn: 肖建华被认为是曾伟巨额财富的前台操作者。
description.en: Xiao Jianhua is considered to have been the frontman managing the immense wealth of Zeng Wei.

description.zh-cn: 周虹文与李彦宏在北京大学就读期间为同班同学。
description.en: Zhou Hongwen and Robin Li were classmates while studying at Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 明天控股是明天系的核心企业。
description.en: Tomorrow Holding is the core enterprise of the Tomorrow Group.

relationships.source: 上海市第一中级人民法院

description.zh-cn: 对被告单位明天控股数罪并罚，决定执行罚金人民币550.3亿元。
description.en: Sentenced the defendant unit Tomorrow Holding to a fine of RMB 55.03 billion for multiple crimes.

description.zh-cn: 依法委托市场机构接管明天系旗下的华夏人寿、天安财险、天安人寿、易安财险、新时代信托和新华信托六家机构。
description.en: Legally entrusted market institutions to take over six institutions under the Tomorrow Group: Huaxia Life, Tian'an P&C, Tian'an Life, Yi'an P&C, New Times Trust, and Xinhua Trust.

description.zh-cn: 依法委托机构托管明天系旗下的新时代证券、国盛证券、国盛期货。
description.en: Legally entrusted institutions to take custody of New Times Securities, Guosheng Securities, and Guosheng Futures under the Tomorrow Group.

description.zh-cn: 包商银行被视为明天系成员。
description.en: Baoshang Bank was considered a member of the Tomorrow Group.

description.zh-cn: 明天系参与了太平洋证券的上市操作。后因国家开发银行副行长王益被查，事件被揭发，导致肖建华出国，明天系逐步转让部分持股。
description.en: The Tomorrow Group participated in the listing operation of Pacific Securities. After China Development Bank Vice Governor Wang Yi was investigated, the incident was exposed, causing Xiao Jianhua to go abroad and the Tomorrow Group to gradually sell off some of its shareholdings.

description.zh-cn: 王益被双规（调查）与太平洋证券上市黑幕有关。
description.en: Wang Yi's investigation was related to the scandal surrounding the listing of Pacific Securities.
